detectors.description: Variable BitcoinAsia._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinAsia.sol#104) is not in mixedCase

BitcoinAsia.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinAsia.sol#114-122) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 1000000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinAsia.sol#118)
detectors.markdown:
